Outside the main area, small groups of students converse as career counselors actively match students with suitable companies. Recruiters from consulting firms attract the greatest attendee interest. Alumni offer advice to current students, and students collect branded tote bags. Hundreds of students walk through the hall, moving between the core area, the surrounding exhibit rooms, and various company booths. The event is filled with new opportunities as companies recruit and students explore options. Recruiters hand out brochures to students.
